metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7451 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The validator module before 1.1.0 for Node.js allows remote attackers to bypass the XSS filter via a nested tag.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7451` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-validator - 3.17.0+dfsg1-1
node-validator - 3.17.0+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: validator.js package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.17.0+dfsg1-1').
